channel.title: Comments on: Bush on “the Google”
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: 725176
item.description: Well, I see I have to defend Bush: he is not the only one in his generation. None of us grew up with computers etc. I was lucky to have good "teachers" supporting me, and I thank them every day. You are one of them...
item.content:encoded: Well, I see I have to defend Bush: he is not the only one in his generation. None of us grew up with computers etc. I was lucky to have good “teachers” supporting me, and I thank them every day. You are one of them…
